name: Sweet Moves
description:
Sweet Moves was our submission for GP 1 in futuregames, the development team was comprised of me, Nelson Kossuga, as the core programmer, Elina Salmenranta, as the sole Game Designer, Hampus Norman, as environment artist and music composer, and Lowe Karlsson, as character artist and animator.

(2021/10/16) The current build is the one we sent in for the jury evaluation.
